title: All the Backlist! June 8, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses Outline, The Three-Body Problem, and more great older books.
This week’s episode was sponsored by Season 2 of Book Riot’s Recommended.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Tensorate Series by JY Yang
Outline by Rachel Cusk
The Passage by Justin Cronin
The Three-Body Problem by Cixin Liu
A Discovery of Witches by Deborah Harkness
Code Name Verity by Elizabeth Wein
Ninefox Gambit by Yoon Ha Lee
The Bone Season by Samantha Shannon
The Priory of the Orange Tree by Samantha Shannon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
